official_title: A concurrent resolution to seek the resurrection of churches and religious freedom in the Ukraine.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President shall take immediate steps to: (1) call upon the Soviet Union to permit the resurrection of churches of all denominations in the Ukraine; (2) utilize contacts with Soviet officials to secure religious freedom in churches as provided for in the Soviet Constitution; and (3) raise in the General Assembly of the United Nations the issue of Stalin's liquidation of churches in the Soviet Union.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to seek the resurrection of churches and religious freedom in the Ukraine.
